# Jan 2019

```{r}
#df1=read_csv("/Users/yayang/Documents/GitHub/amr-uom-brit/output/measures/input_2019-01-01.csv.gz")

df1 <- read_csv(here::here("output","measures","input_2019-01-01.csv.gz"))

df1=df1%>% select("region","age","sex")



```

```{r}
table(df1$sex)
mean(df1$age)
median(df1$age)

median(df1[df1$region=="East",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="East Midlands",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="London",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="North East",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="North West",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="South East",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="South West",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="West Midlands",]$age)
median(df1[df1$region=="Yorkshire and The Humber",]$age)

```
